name: The Chasm: Blue Crystal
description:
A Card Back won by achieving excellent results in open Genius Invokation TCG tournaments.
An indigo-colored mineral that signals the way forward, promising endless adventures along a road extending to the horizon. With its abundant mineral reserves, who knows what untold riches The Chasm still holds...
descriptionraw: A Card Back won by achieving excellent results in open Genius Invokation TCG tournaments.\nAn indigo-colored mineral that signals the way forward, promising endless adventures along a road extending to the horizon. With its abundant mineral reserves, who knows what untold riches The Chasm still holds...
